name: Rhythm Dodge
description:
Rhythm Dodge is a non traditional singeplayer rhythm game, where you have to dodge the incoming beats/notes. 

As of writing this, Rhythm Dodge is currently still in it's prototype phase. Any and all feedback and ideas are welcome.
Feedback form: https://forms.gle/87g2Jo7vVCmpbujz8

Font: ThaleahFont
Menu Song by: LudoLoon Studio
Uplandtional Song: Andy Ray
Determined ApplePie Song by: Andrew Stikov
Eurobeat Mania Song by: Cristian Escalona
